metadata.title: CVE-2024-46686 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:smb/client: avoid dereferencing rdata=NULL in smb2_new_read_req()This happens when called from SMB2_read() while using rdmaand reaching the rdma_readwrite_threshold.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-50.51').
